nodes.documentation:
title fallback when receving money for unknown reason
dev If some extra money received. Well, thank you.

title Increase the allowance of the account to withdraw
dev This function is called when the proposal is successful, therefore it allows certain account to withdraw money from this wallet (via treasury account)
nodes.name: increaseAllowance

nodes.documentation:
title Accept the member to pay their membership fee, via Treasury
dev
nodes.name: payContribution

nodes.documentation:
title Let beneficiary withdraw money, if the proposal is successful
dev When the account asks for money, the wallet gives all that is allowed.
notice We create a sandbox where stores a snapshot of ready-to-withdraw money. 
The amount can be reverted back to main balance sheet if needed.
nodes.name: withdrawMoney

nodes.documentation:
title When smth happened, change the external wallet addres to the new one. 
dev This is owner-only, which is DAA only
notice By calling this function, all the ledger and logic in the contract are lost. 
Only money is transferred to another address.
nodes.name: changeWalletAddress

nodes.documentation:
title Getter for the individual contribution.
param _proposalID the reference ID of proposals
nodes.name: getIndividualContribution

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

changeWalletAddress(address).notice: title When smth happened, change the external wallet addres to the new one.  dev This is owner-only, which is DAA only notice By calling this function, all the ledger and logic in the contract are lost.  Only money is transferred to another address.

getIndividualContribution(address).notice: title Getter for the individual contribution. param _proposalID the reference ID of proposals

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: title Increase the allowance of the account to withdraw dev This function is called when the proposal is successful, therefore it allows certain account to withdraw money from this wallet (via treasury account)

payContribution(address).notice: title Accept the member to pay their membership fee, via Treasury dev

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

withdrawMoney(address).notice: title Let beneficiary withdraw money, if the proposal is successful dev When the account asks for money, the wallet gives all that is allowed. notice We create a sandbox where stores a snapshot of ready-to-withdraw money.  The amount can be reverted back to main balance sheet if needed.
